sentences.sContent: French bread goes stale (= becomes stale ) very quickly.
...but you need to do some self-assessment to determine where you have become stale in your thinking...
...All the advice and public-service announcements about the value of an education that used to sound stale now ring true...

synos.tran: 变陈旧；撒尿；变得不新鲜

remMethod.val: s ＋ tale(传说) → 传说说多了就不新鲜了 → 不新鲜的； 陈腐的

trans.tranCn: 不新鲜的； 陈腐的， 过时的
trans.tranOther: bread or cake that is stale is no longer fresh or good to eat
